ygData.subject: RE: Enchanters/Clerics (off subject of tinkering)  Sorry
ygData.msgSnippet: If somebody dies in a tough area then it should be tough to get the corpse out.  Giving it to clerics wouldn t really effect that anyway, as it s easy enough
ygData.messageBody:
If somebody dies in a tough area then it should be tough to get the corpse
out. Giving it to clerics wouldn't really effect that anyway, as it's easy
enough to get somebody to invis the cleric or the corpse owner to /corpse it
out. Also, no matter if clerics did have invis, to actually res you'd
become visible as soon as you started casting.

-----Original Message-----
From: gordito24@...

What about Clerics? Shouldnt they be allowed regular invis. Especially
when
they have to see corpse in order to res?
